Primary Contact: Mia Burgess, Community Entity Coordinator; Phone: 778.214.4469 * 250.861.6160; Email: mia@centralokanaganfoundation.org
Alternate Contact: Cheryl Miller, Director of Grants & Community Initiatives; Phone: 250.861.6160; Email: cheryl@centralokanaganfoundation.org
Service Details: - Allocates federal funds to the community under the Government of Canada’s Homelessness Partnering Strategy's new Community Entity model- Distributes the Homelessness Partnering Strategy's Designated Communities and Aboriginal Homelessness funds to Canadian Mental Health Association, NOW Canada, Ki-Low-Na Friendship Society, and Okanagan Boys & Girls Clubs for the development of housing and support services
